column1: #text=I had the day off today so I wanted to relax and read a new book .
#text=I decided to go to the library and check one out .
#text=I got my library card from my wallet and walked to the library .
#text=I looked around some of the different sections in the library and found a book in the fiction section that looked interesting .
#text=I took it up to the front counter and handed the librarian the book and my library card .
#text=She scanned the book and my card , told me when the book was due back and then handed the card and the book back to me .
#text=On the way out , I grabbed a bookmark from a table set up near the door .
#text=I walked home and began to read my book .
#text=A week later when I was done reading it , I returned the book to the library and found a new one to check out and take home to read .
